bwwExcerpt: "A Beautiful Noise" isn't a perfect musical, but it is a pretty fantastic concert experience. Despite the structural unevenness, the show succeeds where it matters most — delivering the exuberant spectacle of a Neil Diamond concert. By the time the company launches into a final, soaring rendition of "Sweet Caroline," you'll be out of your seat and singing along.

keyPhrases.quote: Despite the structural unevenness, the show succeeds where it matters most — delivering the exuberant spectacle.
